description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for avapigw API Gateway and Operator running in Kubernetes

panels.description: Total request rate across all gateway instances
panels.title: Gateway Request Rate

panels.description: Percentage of requests resulting in 5xx errors
panels.title: Gateway Error Rate %

panels.description: Rate of reconciliation operations across all controllers
panels.title: Operator Reconcile Rate

panels.description: Rate of reconciliation errors across all controllers
panels.title: Operator Reconcile Errors

panels.description: Request rate broken down by route
panels.title: Request Rate by Route

panels.description: Request duration percentiles (p50, p90, p99)
panels.title: Request Duration p50/p90/p99

panels.description: Number of currently active requests
panels.title: Active Requests

panels.description: Distribution of HTTP status codes
panels.title: Status Code Distribution

panels.description: Health status of backend services (1 = healthy, 0 = unhealthy)
panels.title: Backend Health

panels.description: Circuit breaker state (0 = closed, 1 = half-open, 2 = open)
panels.title: Circuit Breaker State

panels.description: Rate of rate limit hits per route
panels.title: Rate Limit Hits

panels.description: Reconciliation rate broken down by controller
panels.title: Reconcile Rate by Controller

panels.description: Reconciliation error rate broken down by controller
panels.title: Reconcile Errors by Controller

panels.description: Reconciliation duration percentiles (p50, p90, p99)
panels.title: Reconcile Duration p50/p90/p99

panels.description: Percentage of reconciliations that result in errors
panels.title: Reconcile Error Rate %

panels.description: Current depth of work queues
panels.title: Queue Depth

panels.description: Rate of items being added to work queues
panels.title: Queue Adds Rate

panels.description: 99th percentile of time items spend in queue
panels.title: Queue Duration p99

panels.description: 99th percentile of time to process items
panels.title: Work Duration p99

panels.description: Rate of work queue retries
panels.title: Retries Rate

panels.description: Duration of the longest running processor
panels.title: Longest Running Processor

panels.description: Unfinished work in seconds
panels.title: Unfinished Work

panels.description: Leader election status (1 = leader, 0 = not leader)
panels.title: Leader Election Status

panels.description: Number of goroutines in the gateway process
panels.title: Goroutines (Gateway)

panels.description: Memory allocation in the gateway process
panels.title: Memory (Gateway)

panels.description: CPU usage of the gateway process
panels.title: CPU (Gateway)

panels.description: Number of goroutines in the operator process
panels.title: Goroutines (Operator)

panels.description: Memory allocation in the operator process
panels.title: Memory (Operator)

panels.description: CPU usage of the operator process
panels.title: CPU (Operator)

title: avapigw - Gateway & Operator (K8s)
